summary: All files exist and match the spec faithfully. All acceptance criteria pass. Minor issues noted (await in non-async, v5 path in template, require in ESM) but all match spec code blocks exactly.

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Service files exist in systemd/ directory

acceptance_criteria.reason: Copies with variable substitution and daemon-reload

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Dev server starts via npm run dev:systemd

acceptance_criteria.reason: Service sets correct ports and uses concurrently

acceptance_criteria.criterion: All child processes terminated on stop

acceptance_criteria.reason: Test files exist and match spec
